scripts.get-api-gateway-url:dev: cross-env AWS_PROFILE=ergo-one-developer AWS_REGION=us-central-1 yarn -s get-stack-output ergo-one-dev ApiGatewayUrl
scripts.get-web-client-bucket-uri:dev: cross-env AWS_PROFILE=ergo-one-developer AWS_REGION=us-central-1 yarn -s get-stack-output ergo-one-dev WebClientBucketUri
scripts.deploy:backend:local: cross-env AWS_PROFILE=ergo-one-developer AWS_REGION=us-central-1 sam local start-api --parameter-overrides EnvironmentName=local
scripts.deploy:backend:dev: cross-env AWS_PROFILE=ergo-one-developer AWS_REGION=us-central-1 sam deploy --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --parameter-overrides EnvironmentName=dev
scripts.deploy:frontend:dev: cross-env AWS_PROFILE=ergo-one-developer AWS_REGION=us-central-1 aws s3 cp --recursive web-client/dist/ $(yarn -s get-web-client-bucket-uri:dev)
scripts.build-and-deploy:frontend:dev: cross-env VUE_APP_API_URL="$(yarn -s get-api-gateway-url:dev)/api" yarn build:frontend && yarn deploy:frontend:dev
scripts.test:backend:local: cross-env AWS_PROFILE=ergo-one-developer AWS_REGION=us-central-1 BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 jest e2e-tests/
scripts.test:backend:dev: cross-env AWS_PROFILE=ergo-one-developer AWS_REGION=us-central-1 BASE_URL=$(yarn -s get-api-gateway-url:dev) jest e2e-tests/
